title.narrative: Activités de consolidation et de diffusion du programme Innovation au service du développement inclusif
Innovation for Inclusive Development Program Consolidation and Dissemination Activities

description.narrative:
In a response to reductions to the Centre's operating budget, announced in the Government of Canada's 2012 budget, the Centre closed its Innovation for Inclusive Development (IID) program. This research support project will enable the knowledge produced by the IID program to be synthesized, documented, and shared.
The funding will support three activities: 1. Seed funding to an African regional network on Learning, Innovation, and Competence Building Systems (LICS) Africa will foster a network of African policy researchers and practitioners in the field of science, technology, and innovation, and will help to mobilize other funding partnerships. 2. Funding will support scholars from the IID/Group on Research on Innovation for Inclusive Development to meet at the Global Network on the Economics of LICS conference to be held in China in November 2012. 3. A special issue of the journal Innovation and Development (Routledge) will be produced containing papers on innovation, inclusiveness, and development that were commissioned and/or prepared as part of the program launch.
